data.text: @VancouverSun Dr. Victor Lee used to do his colonoscopies in the gastric room at Civic Hospital.I was at the pushing end. He kept his eye out for speed bumps. His wife told him to strip down as soon as he got home because he stunk of human waste. Backdrafts are a real problem. Gas leaks happen
@VancouverSun Those Milk of Magnesia cocktails are killer...
